member.name: PERSIST_FOLDER_TARGET_INFO
member.summary: Specifies a folder shortcut's target folder and its attributes. This structure is used by and .

member.name: PERSIST_FOLDER_TARGET_INFO.pidlTargetFolder
member.summary: A fully qualified PIDL of the target folder. Set pidlTargetFolder to NULL if not specified.

member.name: PERSIST_FOLDER_TARGET_INFO.szTargetParsingName
member.summary: A null-terminated Unicode string with the target folder's parsing name. Set szTargetParsingName to an empty string if not specified.

member.name: PERSIST_FOLDER_TARGET_INFO.szNetworkProvider
member.summary: A null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the type of network provider that will be used when binding to the target folder. The format is the same as that used by the WNet API. Set szNetworkProvider to an empty string if not specified.

member.name: PERSIST_FOLDER_TARGET_INFO.dwAttributes
member.summary: A DWORD value that contains FILE_ATTRIBUTE_* flags as defined in Winnt.h. Set dwAttributes to -1 if not specified.

summary.para: The target folder's CSIDL value, if it has one. Set csidl to -1 if the target folder does not have a CSIDL. In addition to the CSIDL value, you can also set the following two flags.
Indicates that the target folder should change if the user changes the target folder's underlying CSIDL value.
Indicates that the target folder should be created if it does not already exist.
